entities.name: burrow
entities.description: The Burrow is the home of the Weasley family. It is mentioned that it was placed upon the Burrow by both the Order and the Ministry.

entities.name: order
entities.description: The Order is an organization that has placed something upon the Burrow.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is another organization that has placed something upon the Burrow.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a member of the Weasley family. He is mentioned as going to meet the Delacours on top of a nearby hill.

entities.name: delacour
entities.description: The Delacours are a family that Mr. Weasley has gone to meet.

entities.name: portkey
entities.description: A Portkey is an object used for traveling by magic.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a person who has gone to meet the Delacours on top of a nearby hill.

relationships.description: The Order placed something upon the Burrow.
The Ministry also placed something upon the Burrow.
Mr. Weasley has gone to meet the Delacours.
A Portkey is used by Mr. Weasley for traveling by magic.
